fsnodes:
- path: /var/tmp/file1
  type: file
- contents:
    text: '---'
  mode: "0640"
  path: /var/tmp/dir/file1
  type: file
- contents:
    text: test
  path: /var/tmp/dir/file2
  type: file
- ensure_parents: true
  group: lzap
  mode: "0750"
  path: /var/tmp/dir
  type: dir
  user: lzap
name: 'Blueprint example: fsnodes'
